record.field: Currency of bank account and journal must be the same.
Currency on bank account is missing.
A bank account can only be used in one active configuration.
A journal can only be used in one active configuration.
Missing account on the Bank Import Journal. Please configure the journal before proceeding.
There exist unposted batch lines for this account. Before being able to import further transactions these batch lines must be processed:%(batch_lines)s
Initial balance check: The balance of the first Banking Import Line (%(line)s): %(line_balance)s does not match the initial balance of the journal: %(journal_balance)s. Difference: %(difference)s
Running balance check: The balance of the next Banking Import Line (%(line)s): %(line_balance)s does not match the running balance of the journal: %(journal_balance)s. Difference: %(difference)s
